articles.author: WSJ
articles.title: Nike is leaving Russia
articles.description: Sportswear maker previously paused operations in the country because of the war in Ukraine
articles.content: Nike Inc. said Thursday it is leaving Russia, three months after the sportswear company had said it was pausing operations in the country because of the war against Ukraine.
